choices: Classical Greece and Roman Era (or around 200BCE - 200AD)
1.content:
Supreme Pack Leader - he wished the designation name was different, as it reminded him of the terms used by those his people called the Abductors - looked out through the ship's view-screen, towards a certain planet. Space was big, very big, and very dark. The ships had been traveling for a while to their destination - long enough for the Young Wanderers to travel between the packs on the different ships, meet up with the Stayers, perhaps mate with them, and decide to either Stay with that pack or Wander to another pack, where they would again mate with the Stayers, and either stay, or Wander again, until eventually, some of the first ship Wanderers had wandered back to their original ships, and had Wandered to all of the ten major packs, perhaps with a mate that had traveled with them, and had offspring with them as well. The Packs had tried to keep their Traditions alive, at least in the case of the Wanderers - it kept the packs from inbreeding at any rate, and it fostered friendship between the different packs. Of course, with the technology the ships had, this practice wasn't necessary, as the females could look through the genetic banks to pick the perfect male to father their offspring, but there was something about physical interaction that made things better.

Supreme Pack Leader looked at the information he had. The destination reminded him of home, a home that was no longer there. He missed the forests, the fields, the hunting, and more. He looked at the the information on the native lifeforms. The information indicated that most of the animals, as well as the plants, were edible. There was one animal that caught his attention: it was bipedal, nearly furless, had no claws to speak off, and yet seemed to be in almost every environment on the planet. This seemed to be due to the species' use of tools.

"They seem fairly primitive compared to us," his mate said.

Supreme Pack Leader looked at his mate. "I'm sure the Abductors thought the same about us. We hunted, foraged, fished, and farmed. Then they abducted us. We're still around, and they are dead, at least on these ships at any rate."

"What if there is more?" his mate asked.

"I hope not," Supreme Pack Leader said. "We've already lost one home to them. We're not going to lose our new home."

"I want our next litter to feel soil beneath their paws, and feel the wind in their noses," his mate said. "Not these metal floors and ventilation fans."

Supreme Pack Leader smiled, as he held his mate, feeling the life growing in her. "I wish to see them hunt in the tall grasses as I once did, swim in ponds, and streams, and lakes and rivers, as I once did. I wish for stories about traveling through space to be just that - stories."

"I wish that too," his mate said. She looked at the information again. "What do we do with the native species, specifically, this one that can use tools?"

"That one requires special consideration," said Supreme Pack Leader. "The others we can eat, although some management might be required as to not hunt them into extinction. This particular specie, as you can see, seems to be sentient. We might be able to negotiate with them, and thus we can settle in areas they do not yet inhabit. They might prove to be useful as allies. Thus, we will hope for our initial encounters to be peaceful, which might be possible, as there seems to be a number of packs, and most seem to get along with the others."

"What if they are not friendly towards us?" his mate asked. "What if they attack us?"

"We'll assume that any initial attacks done towards our First Contacters were due to miscommunication, and/or fear responses," said Supreme Pack Leader. "We'll try talking to them peacefully again, stating that we mean them no harm, but that we will fight if we have to. If they understand this, and do not harm us again, we might be able to work something out. If they keep trying to attack us, we'll do what's necessary. Hopefully we won't have to kill too many of them."

"I know I did my fair share of killing," his mate said. "We all did."

"The Abductors got what they deserved for what they did to us," said Supreme Pack Leader. "My regret is that I won't get another chance to taste another one: I liked feeling their leader squirm inside of me as he died."

His mate rubbed his belly. "A fitting fate, given that they gave us our new abilities, that being one of them."

Supreme Pack Leader chuckled. "Wouldn't mind feeling that sort of feeling again, although I think I'd let the prey out this time, depending on the situation of course."

His mate chuckled again. "Yes. Then I'd be able to try them."

"Yes," said Supreme Pack Leader. "Now for the probes to be sent out, and do some further investigations. I want to see just how advanced these creatures are."

The Time the Invasion was during

11.content:
Supreme Pack Leader watched the probes, and saw that there was a number of unnatural objects floating around the planet. "Those can't be moons. Send a probe over to one of them."

A moment later, one of the Engineers spoke up. "It's a device for transmitting and receiving information, like our probes."

Supreme Pack Leader's ears perked up at this. "Can we receive information from this device?"

"Give me a few itches," the Engineer said, pressing some buttons. "We're receiving. Lots of information. Pack Leaders. Pack alliances. Some Pack warfare. There's a lot here."

"Have a few more probes check these things out, while the rest check the planet out," said Supreme Pack Leader.


Supreme Pack Leader sat back, and looked at the information. After a while, he found himself being able to understand the words. There was also talking images - those he soon also began to understand after a while. He was also surprised at the amount of space dedicated to what looked like fiction, or at least it looked like fiction, as there wasn't any other references to the events recorded, save by those who had written the information. One thing that really surprised him was things known as fetishes, which included a number of various sexual fantasies. Some of these fantasies involved something called vore, that is, either eating someone or something, or being eaten by someone or something, for sexual pleasure. In some of these scenarios, this inevitably proved fatal to whomever it was that got eat, but in others, the prey was safe through the whole thing, and was later let out, one way, or another.

"Well, that's interesting," his mate said. "We might be able to use our abilities to have some fun after all."

Supreme Pack Leader chuckled. "Let's hold off on that for a bit - don't want to give them the wrong impression of us." He looked at the Chief Engineer. "Technology status?"

"Not as advanced as the Abductors, and we would enjoy a one-to-one ratio, in terms of weapon superiority," said Chief Engineer. "Even ten-to-one we'd be doing good. Problem is, while we might be able to dominate a number of the smaller Packs, they seem to be allied to each other, which would not be good if they decided to fight us at the same time, especially if the Packs of the United States of America, Russia, China, and possibly India, also decided to fight as well. Basically, in the short term, we would win, but in the long term, they can repair, or replace, their damaged craft, while we might have issues. Also, once the odds get to fifteen-to-one, we might start losing craft. On the ground is a similar story - short term success, but long term failure. They can replace ammo and weapons, but we can't, and that's despite our technological advantage. As for unarmed fighting, it would take at least a hundred of them to best an Assault type, but in total, they outnumber us seven thousand to one, and it's not like everyone is an Assault type."

"So, our best bets are to either fight a very quick war, and hope they don't provoke us further, or just arrive peacefully," said Supreme Pack Leader. "Makes me glad we already plan to try the peaceful approach; scout teams of ten - four Basic Infantry, three Recon, two Assault, and one Infiltrator, who has the Designation of Ambassador, while the others act as guards. Give the orders to send the teams. I want to be on the ground, preferably before I'm a father again."

The others grinned at this, each having similar thoughts, as orders to the teams were dispatched.

"Now to wait," said Supreme Pack Leader.
11.title: Modern Era - 2000's

choices: They get contacted by the military forces
111.content:
Ambassador looked at the others on the ship. "We have our orders," he said. "Make contact, and try to encourage a friendly outcome between us and the pack of United States of America."

The others nodded.

"If they attack us, we are to assume that it's just a fear response due to us being different," Ambassador said. "Thus, we'll forgive them, and reassure them of our intentions. That being said, should they continue to be hostile, we are to leave as peacefully as we can."

The rest nodded.

"So, let's hope that we get a friendly reception," said Ambassador. "I want to raise my pups on a place like this."

Everyone smiled at this. Anyplace would be welcome after the ships.

Ambassador looked at them. "Might be a good idea not to show too much teeth."
111.title: Follow the team sent to Washington D. C.

112.content:
"So, this territory we're going to, this Middle East, its full of Pack Warfare, right?" asked a young member of the team.

"Did you fight during the Rebellion?" Ambassador asked.

"Too young for that," said the young one. "My brother did, but, he um, well, he, well, um..... well...."

"He was killed?" Ambassador asked.

The young one nodded. "He was a Basic Infantry, but he was still brave enough to take on the enemy, and fight for our freedom."

"And you got the Assault genes," Ambassador muttered.

The young Assault-type chuckled nervously. "Yes Ambassador."

"You volunteered for this mission?" asked a Recon-type.

"Yes," the Assault-type said. "I want to walk on the soil, and feel the wind in my face, as much as the next Pack member."

"We all want that," said an older Basic Infantry type. "Listen cub, you just pay attention to what you're told, and you'll be having something to tell your grandpups about."

"That's right," said the other Assault type. "You'll be telling stories about how you helped Supreme Pack Leader pick the perfect location for the packs to settle at, and make yourself out to be the Hero of the whole thing."

"Still, what's the deal with this Middle East place?" the young Assault type asked.

"According to this Internet-thing, this area has a lot of a resource knows as oil," said another Basic Infantry type. "It's what these humans fuel their machines with, in one form or another."

"So, we're going to try to take control of this oil stuff, right?" the young Assault type asked.

"Actually, the United States of America Pack has been fighting a number of religious extremist types in this area," said the Basic Infantry type. "These extremists are so strict in their interpretation of their religious texts that other members of their religion, which can be fairly strict in some groups, to believe them to be way too strict. In fact, these extremists are convinced that they are fighting a Holy War, but everyone else believes them to be insane, among other things."

"So, why are we here?" the young Assault type asked.

"The United States of America Pack has their battle-hardened fighters in this region," said Ambassador. "If we can talk to their Chief Fighter, we might be able to get them to talk to other Chief Fighters, so that our other scouting parties are not attacked."

"What if they attack us by accident?" the young Assault type asked.

"Then we disable their vehicles and disarm them," said the Ambassador. "That's Supreme Pack Leader's Standing Order. We are not to kill any of these humans, if we can help it."

"But, what if they try to kill us?" the young Assault type asked.

"Then we get out of here, and let the rest of the Pack know," said the Ambassador.

"What if it's these Extremists that we end up meeting?"

"In that case, we capture them, and take them to the United States of America Pack's nearby den," said Ambassador. "That sends two messages: that we'd like to be friends, and that we don't want to be enemies. Our personal weapons are on non-lethal settings, at the moment. Besides, even if we lost our personal weapons, we still have our Natural weapons, and, by the looks of things, you could easily fit five of these humans inside of your stomach, although I'd advise that you remove their clothing from them; it seems that some have been known to use hidden claws, and explosives."

"Okay," said the young Assault type. "I was just wondering."

Ambassador smiled. "I just hope this First Contact goes better than that of the Abductors'."

"Got some humans over there," said Pilot. "Want me to land?"

"Do so," said Ambassador. "I wonder which Pack these are of."

12.content:
The Supreme Pack Leader watched the footage the probes sent back, and listened to the audio.

He listened as one of the furless Pack Leaders talked about how great the "Fatherland" was, and how it would crush all others that attacked them, and how they'd handle something called the "Jewish Problem", whatever that was. He had a thin strip of fur under his nose. Supreme Pack Leader had a bad feeling about him.

He then listened to another Pack Leader, who had a thicker strip of fur under his nose, who stated that by fighting for the "Motherland", the "Russians" would be able to kill the "German invaders". Supreme Pack Leader had a bad feeling about him as well.

He listened to a third Pack Leader. He sat in a chair, and spoke calmly, saying that he and the "American People" would help their allies overseas, in material, weapons, and "men", and that they would stop the "German Aggressors" as well as the "Japanese Aggressors". Supreme Pack Leader had a good feeling about him.

He listened to a fourth Pack Leader. He talked about how they would help "France" get its freedom back from "Germany", and how "Great Britain" would never surrender. Supreme Pack Leader had a good feeling about him as well.

The more Supreme Pack Leader watched, the more languages he soon realized he could understand. He looked at his mate, and the others watching the footage; they too were understanding the words.

He watched as groups of aircraft fought over a territory called "France", and more over a group of islands in a place called the "Pacific".

He then looked at the one with the designation Chief Engineer. "What do you think?"

"Our craft should be able to take them on, even if they were outnumbered thirty to one," said Chief Engineer. "That being said, the Natives might be able to replace their losses, while we might have some problems. There's also the risk that they might get lucky, and capture one of our wrecks."

"I see," said Supreme Pack Leader. "And on the ground?"

"Similar situation; even if highly outnumbered, we would enjoy an initial advantage in technical superiority, but they might be able to replace their craft, while we would have problems," said Chief Engineer. "To say nothing about if they capture our weapons."

"Unarmed?"

"It would take approximately a hundred to one for them to finally kill an Assault type," said the Chief Biology Specialist. "That being said, they outnumber our entire population by two thousand to one."

"I see," said Supreme Pack Leader. "They'd swamp us with numbers, if they worked together."

"But now they are involved in Pack Warfare, all over the world," said Chief Warfare Specialist. "Except for here, here, and a few other places." He pointed to what was called the United States of America, Canada, Mexico, South America, Australia, southern area of Africa, and the eastern section of the Soviet Union. "That being said, almost all of them are sending material, weapons, and such, towards where the fighting is occurring."

"So, if they worked together, they might win in a prolonged war against us," said Supreme Pack Leader. "Hopefully the overall plan works: either we make our home here, or we will perish. Contact the other Pack Leaders."



A little while later, Supreme Pack Leader looked at the other Pack Leaders. "You know the plan: send in teams of ten - four Basic Infantry, three Recon, two Assault, and one Infiltrator. Infiltrator has the designation of Diplomat, and the others are their Guards. Their mission is to negotiate with the leaders of these humans, and see about acquiring territory for ourselves. Their orders are to try to use peaceful means to do this, and to fight only in self-defense. Avoid casualties if possible, retreat if necessary, and to retaliate only if there is no other choice. I'd rather avoid a war with these people, if possible, but as you all know, our very future is at stake, and if we must fight a war to survive, we will fight one. It will be difficult, even with our technological and biological advantages, so lets hope for a peaceful outcome, and likewise, if we have to go to war, may it be over swiftly. Tell your teams to prepare, learn the humans' languages well, especially those used by the locals, and good luck to them."



Supreme Pack Leader watched the scouting craft leave the ships. He hoped that they would succeed in their mission: contact the Human Pack Leaders, and acquire territory for the Packs to live in. They were sent to the Humans Packs' Leading territories, including the locations known as Washington D.C., London, Berlin, and Moscow, among others. All he could do now was wait, and see what other orders would be necessary - would his people be able to settle on the planet peacefully, or would they have to fight once more?

choices: In the Future - the Humans are Equal to the Wolves

13.content:
Supreme Pack Leader looked at the footage. He then looked at the reports that he'd already had, which had been left by the now dead Abductors.

"Fairly primitive is accurate," he said. "I know we had farms and small settlements, although the hunting was good enough not to worry about needing to grow our own food. Then again, this just might be during the time of the year that they Wander between their Packs."

"That's if they are like us in that aspect," said his mate.

Supreme Pack Leader looked over at the Chief Engineer. "Is this how advanced all these creatures are?"

"Spears made of wood, stone, bone, and sinew," said Chief Engineer. "Of course, some use a specially modified stick to fling a special type of spear further than they can by paw, to say nothing about these ones that have some sort of fiber stretching from one end to the other, that can send another smaller stick towards their target."

"Used to use something similar, back when I was in my pre-Wandering years," said Supreme Pack Leader. "The prey would bleed, and then you can track it, until you were close enough to tear its throat out with your teeth and claws. I remember hunting with my father. We always brought home meat, and my mother and sister brought home plants. Mother was going to take me foraging for plants, and father was going to take my sister hunting, so that we would know how to look for things during our Wandering years, so that we wouldn't eat the wrong plants, or lack the ability to hunt. Then the Abductors came. They took me, and killed my family."

At this, the others paused for a moment, thinking about that dreadful day that they'd all been taken from their home, and had watched it get destroyed. Then, there was the experiments, and the alterations. All of them had been changed, and the changes were passed on to the next generation as well, but not all those experimented upon had made it. Then there was the Rebellion, which had started soon after the Abductors decided to teach them how to use their weapons and abilities. That was a big mistake for them - for the Packs had made the plan to play along with the Abductors, until they had known everything they needed to know, how to use the weapons, their new abilities, how to use the vehicles, where the fuel and ammo was located, how to get the fuel and ammo, how the ships worked, as well as the general plan the Abductors had for them - at which point, the Packs struck back, using the very weapons they'd been trained to use, using the very abilities they'd been given.

As the Leader of the Rebellion, it was only fitting that he personally had put the Abductor Leader to Death, and had Executed the Abductor Leader using one of the very same abilities they had given him, by swallowing the Leader alive, at which point, the other Pack members had done the same to every Abductor still alive. It had been a fitting punishment, feeling the Abductor try to escape, but being unable to do so. Some Abductors had tried to stab or cut their way out of the Pack members that had swallowed them - seems the Pack members' stomach would fill with strong acids, and digest the Abductors while they were alive, after which, the Pack members' injuries quickly healed.

Supreme Pack Leader looked back up at the footage, where he saw the furless creatures kill a very large animal, which had a long flexible nose, and two long teeth that were just about as big as its nose. The large creature had proved to be formidable, even injuring one of the furless creatures with its long teeth, but the rest had managed to cause it to back up in fright, and thus fall off the edge of a cliff. After this, a couple of the furless creatures went to the injured one, and helped him up, while the rest went to join others waiting at the bottom of the cliff, where they finished off the large creature.

"At the very least, they seem to care for their own, and are smart enough to use traps upon their enemies," said Supreme Pack Leader. "Assume that they are as good as adapting as we were. Let's treat them with extreme care. Just because we might be able to dominate them now doesn't mean they can't turn the tables on us in the future. The Abductors abducted us for a reason, and these creatures were part of it. We'd best not underestimate them. Of course, only the Dead know the Future. I wonder what it will bring."
13.title: Prehistory era - 10,000 BCE

131.content:
History records that the furless creatures had called themselves "Humans", although this might have been due to misunderstanding the sounds that a few of them had made when the Pack first encountered them - Hu, Um, and An - which might have simply been sounds of puzzlement, surprise, and perhaps even fear. In any case, the name stuck - the word human was applied to the furless creatures. The humans had also given a name to what the members of the Pack were - Wolves, but again, this might have been a misunderstanding of "Big", "Hairy", or "Scary".

What matters was that the Packs soon settled on the planet. As for the native furless creatures, they had many different reactions - ranging from worshiping the Pack members as if they were Gods, to attacking them, and being captured, to avoiding the Packs, out of fear. Despite some members calling for the complete capture of the creatures, and others calling for their extermination, Supreme Pack Leader had made it a policy - the creatures were to be left alone, providing that they hadn't attacked first. The creatures were not to be mistreated, citing Pack Members experiences at the hands of the Abductors, who had once thought themselves superior to the Pack.

Of course, this policy didn't stop the furless creatures from attacking, but Supreme Pack Leader had made it allowable to capture those that had attacked. It seemed that seeing several of their own being devoured whole and alive took the brunt out of the attacks, as did the sight of seeing captured members of their groups being brought back up, safe, and alive. After a while, the attacks dried up, and soon, the furless creatures merely followed the Packs when they hunted.

In time, understanding was made. In time, the Packs and the furless creatures hunted together, and worked together, though it wasn't easy. In time, the Packs taught the furless "Humans" their story. They then started to build. Then, they learned how to train together, making new weapons, in case the Abductors ever came back. Sometimes they even lived together, and it wasn't unheard of for lonely Pack members and lonely humans to mate with each other, although no offspring was ever produced. It was found that the humans had an interesting flavor, and that some humans enjoyed the experience.

However, there were those who broke the rules, and other troubles. Different organizations were made to try to keep the peace, and pass on understanding, especially as new discoveries were made.
131.title: In the Future - the Humans are Equal to the Wolves

choices: They decide to give each other a good massage
1311.content:
Law Enforcer #56 looked out the viewer the patrol vehicle had. He saw nothing. He listened to the communicator. He heard nothing. That is, he saw and heard nothing that was worth responding to. All he saw was wolves and humans walking past him. All he heard was "All clear" on the communicator. Things seemed to be the same with other Law Enforcers.

He picked up his talker. "All clear."

It was a slow day. Slow days were good. No one had been called for some sort of trouble.

He leaned his seat back, with a sigh.

"Getting bored, big guy?"

Law Enforcer #56 looked over at his partner, Law Enforcer #67. She was a human, while he was an Assault type. He grinned. "Nothing wrong with being bored. I just don't like waiting."

She rubbed his leg. "You didn't do much waiting last night. No sooner had I gotten into the iron frame when you jumped me."

Law Enforcer #56 chuckled. "You weren't complaining all that much yourself."

Law Enforcer #67 grinned. "It had been a while since I'd last had sex with someone. You were the one that offered. I just borrowed the frame to make it better for your sake."

"Did Quartermaster complain about it?" Law Enforcer #56 asked.

"Well, I did tell him that I was going to practice sparring with you," said Law Enforcer #67. "I just didn't say what kind of sparring it was. Of course, I did have to point out the trick you used on me to get me out of the frame. Seems he didn't know about it."

"Neither did I until I did it," said Law Enforcer #56. "I just noticed that joint looked a little weak, and I didn't think there'd be any issue if there was some cosmetic damage for Maintenance to fix up. Didn't know that removing that pin would cause you to fall out of the cage."

"I'm just glad we were done having sex when you did pull that pin, and that I landed on something soft," said Law Enforcer #67.

"I'm just glad that you weren't heavy like Law Enforcer #45," said Law Enforcer #56. "He would have broke a rib or two if he had landed on me like you did, and I mean my rib."

"Don't be such a big cub," said Law Enforcer #67. "You shoved the frame away, flipped me around, brought me to your mouth, and started licking my feet."

Law Enforcer #56 chuckled. "They were sweet, and sweaty."

"And then there was my sex!" Law Enforcer #67 groaned. "Your tongue was very rough on it, although it did feel good."

Law Enforcer #56 grinned. "I know I liked that part. Besides, if the other Law Enforcers smell me on you, I want them to think it was from training, not from sex."

"And then there was my breasts!" Law Enforcer #67 exclaimed. "You could have just finished gulping me down, but no! You just had to have fun with those!"

"You never said 'No' to any of it," Law Enforcer #56 pointed out. "You didn't complain about any of it. Then you went and gave my insides a very good rubbing. I liked that!"

Law Enforcer #67 smiled. "I liked the lick afterwards."

Law Enforcer #56 looked at her. "I'm sure you did."
1311.title: Follow a Law Enforcement Officer

13113.content:
Law Enforcer #56 watched as Law Enforcer #67 undid her seat restraints, and got out of her seat.

"Again?" he asked. "We're on duty at the moment."

Law Enforcer #67 chuckled. "Not that," she said. "I just want to give you a good rubbing."

Law Enforcer #56 grinned. "Alright."

He undid his seat restraints, removed the armor from his upper body, as well as his upper cloth coverings, and flipped himself over, onto his front. He then watched as Law Enforcer #67 removed her armor and cloth coverings. For a moment, he wondered what she'd look like, if she'd been the same species as him. He then watched as she climbed up his seat, and felt as she walked along his back. He felt as she laid down, placed her hands upon one of his shoulders, and started to give them a good rubbing. After a while, she switched to the other one. It felt good, as the stress started to leave his body, at least for a while.

Soon enough, she got off of him, he got out of the seat, watched as she got into hers, laid on her chest, and he started to rub her shoulders. It wasn't much, but it did help to relieve the boredom of waiting for a call. It also helped him to control his own strength - too much, and he could hurt her, not enough, and she might call him a cub. He had to grin.
13113.title: They decide to give each other a good massage

choices: They notice something going on at the place across from them.
131132.content:
"Hey, Law Enforcer #67?" Law Enforcer #56 asked. "Do you want to do some training?"

Law Enforcer #67 chuckled. "You just want to enjoy tasting my sex." She turned herself over. "Am I right?"

Law Enforcer #56 grinned, and licked her upper body. "I'd be a liar if I said 'No.'"

"They might get suspicious about us back at the station," said Law Enforcer #67 as she rubbed Law Enforcer #56's head. "Your scent would be all over me, and they'd certainly smell my scent on you."

"I think they'd be more suspicious if I didn't have your scent on me," said Law Enforcer #56. "I've smelled the scents of plenty of human Law Enforcers on their wolf partners, and no one has commented on it."

"Well, I doubt that many of them have progressed much past licking, or excessive training," said Law Enforcer #67. "I doubt that many male humans could satisfy a female wolf your size, and like you've said, I'm still a little sore from last night."

"At least I wasn't too big for you." Law Enforcer #56 licked Law Enforcer #67 again.

Law Enforcer #67 gave him that lip thing that humans did with those they cared about. Humans couldn't give a proper lick, not that it really mattered.

Law Enforcer #56 backed away, towards the rear of the vehicle, and took off his lower body armor and clothing, as Law Enforcer #67 also took hers off. Law Enforcer #67 then faced Law Enforcer #56, a grin on her face. Law Enforcer #56 grinned as well. The exercise was simple - Law Enforcer #67 just had to reach the back of the vehicle, and likewise, Law Enforcer #56 had to prevent her from doing so. Law Enforcer #67 charged at Law Enforcer #56, trying to get by him. Law Enforcer #56 grabbed her, and pinned her to the floor of the vehicle.

"That's one." Law Enforcer #56 said. "Nineteen more catches, and I get to enjoy my prize."

Law Enforcer #67 chuckled. "We shall see about that."



Twenty attempts, and twenty catches later, Law Enforcer #56 had Law Enforcer #67 pinned to the floor. He was breathing easily. She was also breathing easily. Someone who had tried running from them, wouldn't be breathing so easily. Law Enforcer #56 gave Law Enforcer #67 a lick; she was nice and sweaty. He then gave her another lick, one that they both really enjoyed.

"Now, to enjoy my prize," he said. "If you're up to it."
131132.title: Just some Training. Nothing to see here.

choices: Follow Law Enforcer #56 as he swallows Law Enforcer #67
Follow Law Enforcer #67 as she gets swallowed by Law Enforcer #56
They notice something going on at the place across from them.
1311323.content:
"Alright," said Law Enforcer #67. "What do you want your prize to be?"

"I want my belly rubbed," said Law Enforcer #56. "From the inside."

Law Enforcer #67 chuckled. "Had a feeling it was going to be something like that."

Law Enforcer #56 licked her. "You don't complain too much about those."

"Just remember to swallow some air for me, and let me out in a few scratches," said Law Enforcer #67, as she flipped herself over.

Law Enforcer #56 chuckled. "I wouldn't dream of forgetting to do those."

13113231.content:
Law Enforcer #56 inserted Law Enforcer #67's feet into his mouth, and licked them.

Law Enforcer #67 giggled at this. "That feels nice."

Law Enforcer #56 chuckled. He then resumed swallowing Law Enforcer #67, enjoying the taste of her legs. Soon enough, he got to her sex, and started licking that. He could hear Law Enforcer #67 start to moan in pleasure, and felt her hands slip inside of his mouth. He continued swallowing her, until soon enough, her entire body was in his mouth, and partially down his throat. A while later, she had ended up in his stomach.

Patting his stomach, Law Enforcer #56 soon felt Law Enforcer #67 start to rub his insides. He enjoyed moments such as these.
